text: Create a JSON object with name John and age 25
Make a list of fruits with apple, banana, and orange, each with a price and quantity
Create a person object with name Alice, age 30, and a list of hobbies: reading, swimming
Make a JSON with two products: laptop (price: 999.99, in stock: true) and phone (price: 599.99, in stock: false)
Create a JSON for a book with title 'The Great Gatsby', author 'F. Scott Fitzgerald', year 1925, and available true
